name: Facebook Unlikely
description: Removes the like button from Facebook. Works both for posts and for comments.

user.name: mountainman
user.about: there are two things i know: cheeseburgers are awesome, and no one can own an idea

additional_info: This style is current with regards to Facebook's source code. I expect to update this style if and when Facebook updates their source code. The other user styles I have found listed to perform this function are outdated by years and do not work.
